title: Type in Motion
content: [animated\_text\_1 / time & motion design](http://web.archive.org/web/20090429082021/http:/vimeo.com/973466) from [Michael Hersrud](http://web.archive.org/web/20090429082021/http:/vimeo.com/cutupculture) on [Vimeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20090429082021/http:/vimeo.com/). From the instructor: > Each student had to select a short text excerpt that could be a quote, news headline, passage from a book or play, or poem. with the text create a 10-15 second animation using text only (graphical elements acceptable), black and white only (no gray scale but overlapping transparency is acceptable) and a san serif font. you cannot use any pre-determined 'special effects animations'. you should react to your content and develop an animation to reflect the content, have readability and rhythm, as well as visual interest and experimentation. Added to the [Typophile Group on Vimeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20090429082021/http:/www.vimeo.com/groups/typophile)
author: Joe Pemberton
